      • findById

        <T> T findById(Class<T> type,
               Serializable id,
               boolean lock)
        Finds an entity by ID.
        Parameters:
        type - Entity type.
        id - ID.
        lock - If the entity shall be locked.
        Returns:
        The requested entity or null if it is not found.

        Parameters:
        type - Entity type.
        ids - IDs to find.
        Returns:
        The requested entity or null if it is not found.

        Returns all entities of the persistent type.
        Parameters:
        type - Entity type.
        Returns:
        A list with all the instances.
